publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3763 Mr Tom McCabe: The Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2005 Amendment Order 2006—That the Finance Committee recommends that the draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2005 Amendment Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: George Lyon*

S2M-3763 Mr Tom McCabe: The Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2005 Amendment Order 2006—That the Finance Committee recommends that the draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2005 Amendment Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: George Lyon
